blog.name: cyrusyeehaw
blog.title: andi CRACK
blog.description: jo (she/her) \ minor \ i have an unhealthy obsession with andi mack🤠terfs do not interact

body:
Thank you, Andi Mack.

Thank you, Andi Mack, for showing me it’s okay to be myself.

Thank you, Andi Mack, for giving me hope during a time when I needed it.

Thank you, Andi Mack, for being the representation we all needed.

Thank you for the happiness and love, and I hope there will be more to come.

Thank you, Andi Mack, for being the representation we all needed.

Thank you for the happiness and love, and I hope there will be more to come.

Thank you, Andi Mack.

Thank you, Andi Mack, for showing me it’s okay to be myself.

Thank you, Andi Mack, for giving me hope during a time when I needed it.

Thank you, Andi Mack, for being the representation we all needed.

Thank you for the happiness and love, and I hope there will be more to come.
trail.content:
Thank you, Andi Mack.

Thank you, Andi Mack, for showing me it’s okay to be myself.

Thank you, Andi Mack, for giving me hope during a time when I needed it.

Thank you, Andi Mack, for being the representation we all needed.

Thank you for the happiness and love, and I hope there will be more to come.

summary: so.... what if in episode 8 cyrus is going back and forth between jonah and tj and finally jonah just pulls cyrus aside and is...
body: so…. what if in episode 8 cyrus is going back and forth between jonah and tj and finally jonah just pulls cyrus aside and is like “why are you trying so hard anyway?? we’ve all have problems with tj idk why you’re still friends with him” and then we get cyrus coming out to jonah and confirming his crush on tj

summary: List the top ten characters on Andi Mack 1 being your favorite 10 being your least favorite or the same with 1-5 if you wanted...
question: List the top ten characters on Andi Mack 1 being your favorite 10 being your least favorite or the same with 1-5 if you wanted to do less characters
answer:
1. Cyrus: my relatable baby muffin. Best gay disaster
  2. TJ: TooGay Smitten looks after my boy good and is a sweetheart really
  3. Buffy: most supportive after TJ for my baby muffin and she’s a mf Boss
  4. Marty: my man from the party is cute and fab. Best counterpart to Buffy
  5. Bex: hilarious bamf distaster trying her best at the mum thing and being cool
  6. Jonah: needs a backstory but he’s honestly priceless. Funny in his obliviousness but nb since he got a personality past Jonah Beck™
  7. Cece: honestly love her she’s funny af. Precious little Cece
  8. Bowie: what a dude. He’s adorable and fantastic
  9. Andi: she’s honestly great and all like love the crafty things but sometimes gets on my nerves sorry
  10. Reed: gotta represent our boy. Such a minor character but the big gay energy along with pushing to show TJ is actually bloody amazing and Cyrus should love TJ forever so

title: Hello~
body:
@kasuca , I am your Secret Santa, hiiiii~  <3

I had tons of ideas for you and I do plan to finish the ones I started but couldn’t complete, but the gift I choosed from all of them for you is below.
I couldn’t decide if I like the shadowed (it is a word o.o) better or the plain one, but I decided to show you both.
It’s not much, but I hope you like it!!!

ps. Sorry I was late with posting this, I was at work o.o
